subtitle.Text: Karla: Okay, the Wildfire book! Oh man, look at this thing. Yeah, this was another one of those situations which I totally felt like a weird creepo when I was doing research
and there was a lot of really horrifying romance novel covers. This poor guy was on somebody’s Flickr account that was allowed,
that was Creative Commons Attribution License and I think he was playing volleyball or something? And…
Steve: So you just put suspenders on him and put an axe in his hand and now he’s a fireman!
Karla: I did it and I will cop to it and I’d do it again. Also, as I recall, because I’m a noob I initially picked total bondage suspenders -
Steve: That’s true, so you had started working on it and I went upstairs and then I came back down…
Karla: And like Johnnemann and I were like, hm, what should we do for this thing -
Steve: And I was like, those are fucking leather daddy suspenders, what are you doing??
Karla: And what I should’ve said is, damn it, he noticed!
